name: Fidelity National Financial, Inc.
description: Fidelity National Financial, Inc. (FNF) is a leading provider of title insurance, mortgage services, and diversified services in the real estate sector. Established in 1847, FNF has built a reputation for reliability and innovation in the title insurance industry. The company operates through several subsidiaries, offering a range of services that include title insurance underwriters, title agencies, and technology solutions for the real estate and mortgage industries. With a commitment to customer service and operational excellence, FNF has expanded its footprint across the United States and internationally, facilitating property transactions with efficiency and security. The company's technology-driven solutions, such as digital closing services and remote online notarization, reflect its dedication to simplifying the closing process for customers. FNF's diversified business model also includes a robust mortgage services segment, providing solutions that enhance efficiency for lenders and borrowers alike. As a publicly traded company on the New York Stock Exchange, Fidelity National Financial continues to leverage its extensive industry experience to drive growth and shareholder value, while actively engaging in community and environmental stewardship initiatives.

seo.meta_title: Fidelity National Financial, Inc. | Title Insurance and Real Estate Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Fidelity National Financial, Inc., a leader in title insurance and mortgage services, committed to providing innovative solutions for real estate transactions.

faq.question: What services does Fidelity National Financial provide?
faq.answer: Fidelity National Financial provides title insurance, mortgage services, and technology solutions for real estate transactions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Fidelity National Financial?
faq.answer: Michael Nolan is the CEO of Fidelity National Financial, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Fidelity National Financial headquartered?
faq.answer: Fidelity National Financial is headquartered in Jacksonville, Florida, USA.

faq.question: When was Fidelity National Financial founded?
faq.answer: Fidelity National Financial was founded in 1847.
